  45class ManageClient(
  46    AbstractSyncRestClient
  47):  # pylint: disable=too-many-public-methods,too-many-lines
  48    """
  49    A client for managing Deepgram projects and associated resources via the Deepgram API.
  50
  51    This class provides methods for performing various operations on Deepgram projects, including:
  52    - Retrieving project details
  53    - Updating project settings
  54    - Managing project members and scopes
  55    - Handling project invitations
  56    - Monitoring project usage and balances
  57
  58    Args:
  59        config (DeepgramClientOptions): all the options for the client.
  60    """
  61
  62    _logger: verboselogs.VerboseLogger
  63    _config: DeepgramClientOptions
  64    _endpoint: str
  65
  66    def __init__(self, config: DeepgramClientOptions):
  67        self._logger = verboselogs.VerboseLogger(__name__)
  68        self._logger.addHandler(logging.StreamHandler())
  69        self._logger.setLevel(config.verbose)
  70
  71        self._config = config
  72        self._endpoint = "v1/projects"
  73        super().__init__(config)
  74
  75    # projects
  76    def list_projects(
  77        self,
  78        timeout: Optional[httpx.Timeout] = None,
  79        addons: Optional[Dict] = None,
  80        headers: Optional[Dict] = None,
  81        **kwargs,
  82    ) -> ProjectsResponse:
  83        """
  84        List all projects for the current user.
  85        """
  86        return self.get_projects(
  87            timeout=timeout, addons=addons, headers=headers, **kwargs
  88        )
  89
  90    def get_projects(
  91        self,
  92        timeout: Optional[httpx.Timeout] = None,
  93        addons: Optional[Dict] = None,
  94        headers: Optional[Dict] = None,
  95        **kwargs,
  96    ) -> ProjectsResponse:
  97        """
  98        Gets a list of projects for the authenticated user.
  99
 100        Reference:
 101        https://developers.deepgram.com/reference/get-projects
 102        """
 103        self._logger.debug("ManageClient.get_projects ENTER")
 104        url = f"{self._config.url}/{self._endpoint}"
 105        self._logger.info("url: %s", url)
 106        self._logger.info("addons: %s", addons)
 107        self._logger.info("headers: %s", headers)
 108        result = self.get(
 109            url, timeout=timeout, addons=addons, headers=headers, **kwargs
 110        )
 111        self._logger.info("json: %s", result)
 112        res = ProjectsResponse.from_json(result)
 113        self._logger.verbose("result: %s", res)
 114        self._logger.notice("get_projects succeeded")
 115        self._logger.debug("ManageClient.get_projects LEAVE")
 116        return res

 148    def update_project_option(
 149        self,
 150        project_id: str,
 151        options: Union[Dict, ProjectOptions],
 152        timeout: Optional[httpx.Timeout] = None,
 153        addons: Optional[Dict] = None,
 154        headers: Optional[Dict] = None,
 155        **kwargs,
 156    ) -> Message:
 157        """
 158        Updates a project's settings.
 159
 160        Reference:
 161        https://developers.deepgram.com/reference/update-project
 162        """
 163        self._logger.debug("ManageClient.update_project_option ENTER")
 164        url = f"{self._config.url}/{self._endpoint}/{project_id}"
 165        self._logger.info("url: %s", url)
 166        self._logger.info("project_id: %s", project_id)
 167        if isinstance(options, ProjectOptions):
 168            self._logger.info("ProjectOptions switching class -> dict")
 169            options = options.to_dict()
 170        self._logger.info("options: %s", options)
 171        self._logger.info("addons: %s", addons)
 172        self._logger.info("headers: %s", headers)
 173        result = self.patch(
 174            url, json=options, timeout=timeout, addons=addons, headers=headers, **kwargs
 175        )
 176        self._logger.info("json: %s", result)
 177        res = Message.from_json(result)
 178        self._logger.verbose("result: %s", res)
 179        self._logger.notice("update_project_option succeeded")
 180        self._logger.debug("ManageClient.update_project_option LEAVE")
 181        return res

 210        )

 267    def get_project_models(
 268        self,
 269        project_id: str,
 270        options: Optional[Union[Dict, ModelOptions]] = None,
 271        timeout: Optional[httpx.Timeout] = None,
 272        addons: Optional[Dict] = None,
 273        headers: Optional[Dict] = None,
 274        **kwargs,
 275    ) -> ModelsResponse:
 276        """
 277        Gets models for a specific project.
 278
 279        Reference:
 280        https://developers.deepgram.com/reference/get-project
 281        https://developers.deepgram.com/reference/get-model
 282
 283        Args:
 284            project_id (str): The ID of the project.
 285            options (Optional[Union[Dict, ModelOptions]]): The options for the request.
 286            timeout (Optional[httpx.Timeout]): The timeout setting for the request.
 287            addons (Optional[Dict]): Additional options for the request.
 288            headers (Optional[Dict]): Headers to include in the request.
 289            **kwargs: Additional keyword arguments.
 290
 291        Returns:
 292            ModelsResponse: A response object containing the model details.
 293        """
 294        self._logger.debug("ManageClient.get_project_models ENTER")
 295
 296        if options is None:
 297            options = ModelOptions()
 298
 299        url = f"{self._config.url}/{self._endpoint}/{project_id}/models"
 300        self._logger.info("url: %s", url)
 301        self._logger.info("project_id: %s", project_id)
 302        if isinstance(options, ModelOptions):
 303            self._logger.info("ModelOptions switching class -> dict")
 304            options = options.to_dict()
 305        self._logger.info("options: %s", options)
 306        self._logger.info("addons: %s", addons)
 307        self._logger.info("headers: %s", headers)
 308        result = self.get(
 309            url, json=options, timeout=timeout, addons=addons, headers=headers, **kwargs
 310        )
 311        self._logger.info("json: %s", result)
 312        res = ModelsResponse.from_json(result)
 313        self._logger.verbose("result: %s", res)
 314        self._logger.notice("get_project_models succeeded")
 315        self._logger.debug("ManageClient.get_project_models LEAVE")
 316        return res

 549        headers: Optional[Dict] = None,
 550        **kwargs,
 551    ) -> Key:
 552        """
 553        Creates a new key.
 554
 555        Reference:
 556        https://developers.deepgram.com/reference/create-key
 557        """

 560        self._logger.info("url: %s", url)

 563            self._logger.info("KeyOptions switching class -> dict")
 564            options = options.to_dict()
 565        self._logger.info("options: %s", options)
 566        self._logger.info("addons: %s", addons)
 567        self._logger.info("headers: %s", headers)
 568        result = self.post(
 569            url, json=options, timeout=timeout, addons=addons, headers=headers, **kwargs
 570        )
 571        self._logger.info("json: %s", result)
 572        res = Key.from_json(result)
 573        self._logger.verbose("result: %s", res)

class ManageClient(deepgram.clients.abstract_sync_client.AbstractSyncRestClient): 
  46class ManageClient(
  47    AbstractSyncRestClient
  48):  # pylint: disable=too-many-public-methods,too-many-lines
  49    """
  50    A client for managing Deepgram projects and associated resources via the Deepgram API.
  51
  52    This class provides methods for performing various operations on Deepgram projects, including:
  53    - Retrieving project details
  54    - Updating project settings
  55    - Managing project members and scopes
  56    - Handling project invitations
  57    - Monitoring project usage and balances
  58
  59    Args:
  60        config (DeepgramClientOptions): all the options for the client.
  61    """
  62
  63    _logger: verboselogs.VerboseLogger
  64    _config: DeepgramClientOptions
  65    _endpoint: str
  66
  67    def __init__(self, config: DeepgramClientOptions):
  68        self._logger = verboselogs.VerboseLogger(__name__)
  69        self._logger.addHandler(logging.StreamHandler())
  70        self._logger.setLevel(config.verbose)
  71
  72        self._config = config
  73        self._endpoint = "v1/projects"
  74        super().__init__(config)
  75
  76    # projects
  77    def list_projects(
  78        self,
  79        timeout: Optional[httpx.Timeout] = None,
  80        addons: Optional[Dict] = None,
  81        headers: Optional[Dict] = None,
  82        **kwargs,
  83    ) -> ProjectsResponse:
  84        """
  85        List all projects for the current user.
  86        """
  87        return self.get_projects(
  88            timeout=timeout, addons=addons, headers=headers, **kwargs
  89        )
  90
  91    def get_projects(
  92        self,
  93        timeout: Optional[httpx.Timeout] = None,
  94        addons: Optional[Dict] = None,
  95        headers: Optional[Dict] = None,
  96        **kwargs,
  97    ) -> ProjectsResponse:
  98        """
  99        Gets a list of projects for the authenticated user.
 100
 101        Reference:
 102        https://developers.deepgram.com/reference/get-projects
 103        """
 104        self._logger.debug("ManageClient.get_projects ENTER")
 105        url = f"{self._config.url}/{self._endpoint}"
 106        self._logger.info("url: %s", url)
 107        self._logger.info("addons: %s", addons)
 108        self._logger.info("headers: %s", headers)
 109        result = self.get(
 110            url, timeout=timeout, addons=addons, headers=headers, **kwargs
 111        )
 112        self._logger.info("json: %s", result)
 113        res = ProjectsResponse.from_json(result)
 114        self._logger.verbose("result: %s", res)
 115        self._logger.notice("get_projects succeeded")
 116        self._logger.debug("ManageClient.get_projects LEAVE")
 117        return res

 119    def get_project(
 120        self,
 121        project_id: str,

 124        headers: Optional[Dict] = None,
 125        **kwargs,
 126    ) -> Project:
 127        """
 128        Gets details for a specific project.
 129
 130        Reference:
 131        https://developers.deepgram.com/reference/get-project

A client for managing Deepgram projects and associated resources via the Deepgram API.

This class provides methods for performing various operations on Deepgram projects, including:

  • Retrieving project details
  • Updating project settings
  • Managing project members and scopes
  • Handling project invitations
  • Monitoring project usage and balances

Args: config (DeepgramClientOptions): all the options for the client.

ManageClient(config: deepgram.options.DeepgramClientOptions) 
67    def __init__(self, config: DeepgramClientOptions):
68        self._logger = verboselogs.VerboseLogger(__name__)
69        self._logger.addHandler(logging.StreamHandler())
70        self._logger.setLevel(config.verbose)
71
72        self._config = config
73        self._endpoint = "v1/projects"
74        super().__init__(config)
